summary: In ancient China, a husband and wife, both of them retired superheroes, contend with the high cost of living, infertility, and other contemporary life issues.
cast: Zhang Wen|Edison Wang|Qin Li|Bo Zhou|Chapman To|Jing Li|Yunwei He|Wowkie Zhang|Adam Chung-Tai Chan|Xiting Fang|Min-Hun Fung|Xiaolan Huang|Vincent Kok|Louis Koo|Sibo Liu|Sandra Kwan Yue Ng|Dongfang Wang|Jing Wu|Changjiang Zhang
keywords: non comic book superhero|china|chinese|husband wife relationship|superhero
title: San kei hap lui
